channel.title: LYNX RSPS[NEW RSPS]customs items/npc and way more!
channel.description:
WELCOME TO MY 2ND POST ON THIS SITE.
the server is back up. you will need to download the client in news and announcements or downlaod here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/7ygosig7qx1kgdy/Lynx.jar?dl=0
WEBSITE: lynx317.com
we got custom items and npc. we are looking for players. we have all skills, new home, more stuff to do.
donator zone: [img]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l268/stevenherman1995/donatorzonenpc1_zps32bbb133.jpg[/img] [img]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l268/stevenherman1995/donatorzonenpc2_zpsb3c18403.jpg[/img] [img]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l268/stevenherman1995/donatorzonenpc3_zpse2199dc1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l268/stevenherman1995/donatorzonenpc4_zpsd1d75bbf.jpg[/img]
custom items:
COMING SOON!!!
pk point shop: [img]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l268/stevenherman1995/pkshop_zpsad35c6be.jpg[/img]
npc kill point shop: [img]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l268/stevenherman1995/npckillpointshop_zps36728ec6.jpg[/img]
fire point shop: [img]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l268/stevenherman1995/firepointshop_zpsc1932606.jpg[/img]
random stuff: [img]http://i98.photobucket.com/albums/l268/stevenherman1995/randomstuffshop_zps0933bc0c.jpg[/img]

WEBSITE: lynx317.com

item.dc:creator: @bartsimpson bartsimpson
item.description:
@bartsimpson wrote:

the vps went down atm, we are waiting for the vps people to get the vps back up. ill let you guys know when its back up, and ill work on this post somemore later when i have the time to do it.

item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The website could use some work. Looks like a template that was poorly converted to their design (no offence m8, honesty here).
I’ll check out in game (bored af) and edit this comment. So ye.

Can’t even play. GF.

item.title: LYNX RSPS[NEW RSPS]customs items/npc and way more!
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Very fun server to play.
I really like the NPCs areas with the points collecting and point shops.

I’ve seen some custom items, although i hope more will follow soon.
Only downside is actually this advertisement thread as it looks so poor.

Read full topic
